entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
